com.paydiant.android.ui.service.transaction

Interface ICancelTransactionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CancelTransactionListenerAdapter

    public interface ICancelTransactionListener
    The listener interface for receiving ICancelTransactionService operation callbacks. In order to register for callback events, an instance of this would needed to be set through the ICancelTransactionService.setCancelTransactionListener(ICancelTransactionListener) method. This must be set before invoking any of the service operations.

    Note: App developers are encouraged to use the ListenerAdapter implementations whenever possible as the Listener interfaces might get updated with new functionality/methods from one SDK release to the other. Therefore using a ListenerAdapter will make sure that there wont be any compilation issues due to unimplemented methods during a SDK upgrade.

    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.
    See Also:
    CancelTransactionListenerAdapter

        void onCancelTransactionError(PaydiantException e)
        The call back if an error occurs.
        Parameters:
        e - - instance of PaydiantException which handles both the Server and Client errors and encapsulates the details of the exception such as statusCode.
